name: AXRegistryExportServerConfiguration
description: Exports a Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 server configuration
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: instanceName
inputs.label: Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The instance name of the ax 2012 server configuration.

inputs.name: configurationName
inputs.label: Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration name of the ax 2012 server configuration. (Default is used, if empty)

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Configuration file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to save the configuration file.

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX Registry - Export server configuration (.axc): $(instanceName) - $(configurationName)
